conbody.p: After the xrefs having been attached to the drawing, the systemautomatically checks whether the original drawing file is modified in certain intervals since it loaded or reloaded the last time. The xref icon located at the right lower corner of the status bar appears an exclamatory mark once the xref file has been modified, and needs to reload. You can click this icon to open xref Manager to reload the changed xrefs. Xref notification behavior is controlled by the XREFNOTIFYsystemvariable.
